#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{

        char a[10001],b[10001];
        int t;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--)
        {
            int ar[26]={0},br[26]={0};
            cin>>a>>b;
            int x,y;
            x=strlen(a);
            y=strlen(b);
            if(x==y)
            {
                for(int i=0;i<x;i++)
                {
                    if(isupper((a[i])))
                    {


                    ar[a[i]-'A']++;
                    }
                    else
                        ar[a[i]-'a']++;
                    if(isupper(b[i]))
                    br[b[i]-'A']++;
                    else
                        br[b[i]-'a']++;
                }
                int count=0;
                for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
                {
                   if(ar[i]!=br[i])
                    count=1;
                }
               // cout<<x<<endl;
                if(count)
                    cout<<"NO"<<endl;
                else
                    cout<<"YES"<<endl;
            }

            else
                cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        }
        return 0;
}
